editorialDecl.p: This text is a transcription of Paris, Maz. 717, which was also the basis for Baron's 1963 edition (though with several inaccuracies); the text has been emended only where required for sense. His text will eventually be replaced by a new edition from the Hugo von Sankt Viktor Institut.

Original spelling, punctuation, and abbreviations have been retained. An attempt has been made to record the exact word division in the manuscript. Characters from the MUFI private use area have been used for some marks not found in Unicode (following the format of the ENRICH Gaiji Bank).

normalization.p: The @break attribute is editorial, and does not necessarily correspond to the word division implied by the hyphenation (encoded separately).
